title: Old English blood boyling afresh in Leicestershire men: occasioned by the late barbarous invasion of the Scots. As appears by this letter from my Lord Grey, to Major Generall Skippon.
author: Groby, Thomas Grey, Baron of, 1623?-1657.
publisher: Printed by H. for Giles Calvert, at the black spread-eagle, at the West end of Pauls,
